text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Trainer

Ah, Madoka,
may I have a moment?
Sure.

Is it about the direction again?
That kind of thing?
Haha...

I thought you might have some opinions,
so I wanted to ask just in case.

I assumed you'd understand that there's
no room for that kind of thing right now.
I-Is that so...
...In that case.

Right now, everyone is all over the place,
making little mistakes.

The things we can't do in the practice room,
we definitely can't do on stage.

The dance teacher says it's not going well
because everyone is all over the place.

After all, isn't the job of
an idol to perform?

Yeah...
I won't force you.

But... because it's something we all create together,
if you have any opinions, I want you to speak up.

...Right now, there's no room for that,
so I'll leave it to you.

I see... Yeah.
Sorry for trying to hold you back.
